# About me

I am a researcher from Costa Rica, working at the Sociology department from the Vrije Universiteit Amsterdam (VU). Overall my work is about development, test of data analysis methods, and their applications in a variety of applied fields. 

I am passionate about open-source science/software, and collaborative research.
